titleStmt.title: Two disputations of original sin I. of original sin as from Adam, II. of original sin as from our neerer parents : written long ago for a more private use, and now published (with a preface) upon the invitation of Dr. T. Tullie / by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
